note:
Dutch climate journalist & science writer. Specialised in climatology and geosciences, but those can be boring - so I have a few additional interests: ecology, energy & geopolitics.

Reporter for news outlet NU.nl, occasional longreads for Vrij Nederland, De Correspondent.

Ecological gardening is cool, so are hedges. Used to write some reports, factsheets, blogs and half a book - but now in a rush to spot a specific bee. And I can't find it.
